name: t3_21xt9f
title: CMV: Giraffe is the best system of government ever devised
body:
It's outrageous to me that even now, in the year one million and a half, I hear grumblings from my fellow slaves about Giraffe. Under Giraffe do we not have castles, jobs, fine crowns? This talk of the consequences of defoliation and thoughts of implementing democracy are hubristic and short-sighted, and, yes, immoral; for did not Giraffe get in power as a result of man paying for his misdeeds? Please, CMV!

_____
